application

Class PcApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.PcApplication

  • public class PcApplication
extends java.lang.Object
    The main application of the PC project

    The application responsible for the user interface using the Lejos LCD's API, as well as initializing the logger and the robot

    See Also:
    Logger, Robot
